# Acknowledgements



```{r eval=FALSE}
bookdown::serve_book()
bookdown::render_book("index.Rmd", "bookdown::pdf_book")

```


```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(auspol)
library(aussiemaps)
library(auscensus)

# automatically create a bib database for R packages
knitr::write_bib(c(
  .packages(), 'bookdown', 'knitr', 'rmarkdown',"tigris","cropgrowdata"
), 'packages.bib')
```
